title: While doing ghusl for major ritual impurity if some semen comes out, is ghusl valid? assim al hakeem
transcript: so she my question is that if I am doing W from major rituality um if some semen comes out while I'm doing my go uh not with pleasure just like left over so would I have to repeat my go or should I continue and my will be valid just I I don't understand what happened while you're doing your uh some semen came out no if the semen that comes out comes out uh like the form of Medi or when urinating this has no impact on your the semen that comes out in an gushing form you ejaculate semen while accompanied by a feeling of sensation this is what invalidates your
